content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_charithastorage123_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_charithastorage123_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@charithastorage123.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.DimAccount (
	[AccountNumber] int,
	[AccountSK] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'DimAccount/part-00000-20eb0d99-7bba-413f-978a-6adb9bff2c88-c000.snappy.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_charithastorage123_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.DimAccount
GO
